sense.def:
Z besedo
especially
povemo, da se tisto, kar govorimo, nanaša na eno stvar bolj kot na drugo.

seg.quote: He was kind to his staff, especially those who were sick or in trouble.
Double ovens are a good idea, especially if you are cooking several meals at once.

sense.def:
Besedo
especially
uporabljamo s pridevnikom, da bi poudarili neko lastnost.

seg.quote: He found his host especially irritating.
They didn't find it especially hard.
